ParticlesSystem

Class GridParticle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticlesSystem.Particle
      • ParticlesSystem.GridParticle

  • public class GridParticle
extends Particle
    A tied up particles is linked up to a grid, which means it has a spring attached to an initial position.
